mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from sys_user_role ur LEFT JOIN sys_role_menu rm on ur.role_id = rm.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_menu m on rm.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and ur.del_flag = 0 and rm.del_flag = 0 and m.del_flag = 0 and m.perms is not null
